channel.title: [PI] Bows + Arrows
channel.description:
Sup guys, i've just began learning java and how it works, and what i would like to know is how to fix bows/arrows.
First off the arrows i want in my server do not stack, they just have say 28 arrows taking up my whole inventory except just 1 slot that holds an amount of arrows. How do i fix?
My second problem is that i am trying to make my sagatarian longbow work properly, problem is the above problem with the sagatarian arrows, and even if still only 1 sagatarian arrow is equipped it still says the bow can only fire sagatarian arrows.
:/ Helllpp
